title: Mean PM2.5 concentration
description: Used to quantify air quality with measures of concentrations of fine inhalable particles, with diameters that are generally 2.5 micrometers and smaller in the air. Also see https://www.epa.gov/air-trends/particulate-matter-pm25-trends

title: Palmer drought severity index
description: The Palmer Drought Severity Index (PDSI) uses readily available temperature and precipitation data to estimate relative dryness. See more details from https://climatedataguide.ucar.edu/climate-data/palmer-drought-severity-index-pdsi

title: Annual greenhouse gas emissions from large facilities
description: Measures the total annual greenhouse gas emissions (non-biogenic) from large facilities

title: Lifetime air toxics cancer risk
description: Probability of contracting cancer over a 70 year lifetime due to air pollutant exposure

title: CO2 emissions per capita
description: Total amount of carbon dioxied emissions per person

title: Earthquakes
description: Total number of earthquakes that occured

title: Cyclones
description: Total number of cyclones that occured
